hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GERRIT_PATCHSET_NUMBER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: just need that for using only in build name

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#list of branches, sort from older to newer declare -a SFB_branches=("3.0.1" "3.0.4.GA" "3.1.0" "3.2" "feature/3.2/media_separation" "feature/3.2/device_manager" "feature/3.2/IGS_unified") #if the current gerrit branch is the last on the list then exit: #because there is no need to cherry pick it to anywhere if [ "${SFB_branches[${#SFB_branches[@]}-1]}" == "${GERRIT_BRANCH}" ]; then exit 0; fi
#some init params url="https://gerrit/a/changes/?q=" vote=1 declare -a missingBranches
#loop the branch list for i in "${!SFB_branches[@]}"; do #find the gerrit branch in list if [[ "${SFB_branches[$i]}" = "${GERRIT_BRANCH}" ]]; then echo "*** SFB_branches[$i] is THE current branch ***" index=${i}; continue; else echo "*** SFB_branches[$i] is not the current branch ***" fi #if gerrit branch was already found, then check if current branch has this change-ID if [[ $index ]]; then exist=$(curl -k -s --digest --basic -u jenkins:$curl_pass $url$GERRIT_CHANGE_ID |grep -c "\"branch\": \"${SFB_branches[$i]}\"" || true); if [[ "$exist" = "0" ]]; then echo "*** Change-ID was not found in branch ${SFB_branches[$i]} ***" vote=-1; missingBranches+=("${SFB_branches[$i]}") else echo "*** Change-ID does exist in branch ${SFB_branches[$i]} ***" fi fi done
echo "*** check was done. need to vote $vote to gerrit ***" echo "*** these are the branched without cherry-pick: ${missingBranches[@]} ***"
############################# #reply vote to gerrit label Cherry-Pick + message if [[ "$vote" = "-1" ]]; then # ssh -vvv -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --project IPP/SFB --message "'missing cherry-pick to branch: ${missingBranches[@]}, please retry when done: $BUILD_URL'" --label Cherry-Pick=-1 $GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION curl -k -u jenkins:$curl_pass --basic -X POST https://gerrit/a/changes/${GERRIT_CHANGE_NUMBER}/revisions/${GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION}/review -d "{\"message\": \"missing cherry-pick to branch: ${missingBranches[@]}, please retry when done: ${BUILD_URL}\", \"labels\": {\"Cherry-Pick\": \"-1\"}}" -H 'Content-Type:application/json' else # ssh -vvv -p 29418 jenkins@gerrit gerrit review --project IPP/SFB --message "'No missing cherry-pick'" --label Cherry-Pick=1 $GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION curl -k -u jenkins:$curl_pass --basic -X POST https://gerrit/a/changes/${GERRIT_CHANGE_NUMBER}/revisions/${GERRIT_PATCHSET_REVISION}/review -d "{\"message\": \"No missing cherry-pick\", \"labels\": {\"Cherry-Pick\": \"+1\"}}" -H 'Content-Type:application/json' fi
